snippet: Darius McCollum, who has Asperger syndrome and a habit of taking buses and subways for joy rides, may have another chance at help, if he wants it.
abstract: Darius McCollum, who has Asperger's syndrome and a habit of taking New York City buses and subways for joy rides, may have another chance at help, if he wants it; scheduled for sentencing in in Queens Criminal Court for stealing yet another bus, McCollum's lawyer says he is likely to be paroled and sent to a residential treatment program with a long-term, detailed therapy plan.
lead_paragraph: Darius McCollum, who has Asperger syndrome and a habit of taking buses and subways for joy rides, may have another chance at help, if he wants it.

headline.main: Jailed Often Because of His Transit Obsession, Man May Get Help
headline.print_headline: Jailed Often, Transit-Obsessed Man May Get Help
